Package com.flag4j.core

Interface VectorComparisonsMixin<T,​U,​V,​W,​Y,​X extends Number>

Type Parameters:
T - Vector type.
U - Dense vector type.
V - Sparse vector type.
W - Complex vector type.
Y - Real vector type.
X - Vector entry type.
All Superinterfaces:
TensorComparisonsMixin<T,​U,​V,​W,​Y,​X>
public interface VectorComparisonsMixin<T,​U,​V,​W,​Y,​X extends Number> extends TensorComparisonsMixin<T,​U,​V,​W,​Y,​X>
This interface specifies comparisons which all vectors should implement.

  • Method Details

    • equals

      boolean equals​(Vector b)
      Checks if two vectors are equal (element-wise). This method DOES take into consideration the orientation of the vectors.
      Parameters:
      b - Second vector in the equality.
      Returns:
      True if this vector and vector b are equivalent element-wise. Otherwise, returns false.

    • equals

      boolean equals​(SparseVector b)
      Checks if two vectors are equal (element-wise). This method DOES take into consideration the orientation of the vectors.
      Parameters:
      b - Second vector in the equality.
      Returns:
      True if this vector and vector b are equivalent element-wise. Otherwise, returns false.

    • sameShape

      boolean sameShape​(Vector b)
      Checks if two vectors have the same shape. This method DOES take the two vectors orientations into account.
      Parameters:
      b - Vector to compare to this vector.
      Returns:
      True if this vector and vector b have the same orientation and length. Otherwise, returns false.

    • sameShape

      boolean sameShape​(SparseVector b)
      Checks if two vectors have the same shape. This method DOES take the two vectors orientations into account.
      Parameters:
      b - Vector to compare to this vector.
      Returns:
      True if this vector and vector b have the same orientation and length. Otherwise, returns false.

    • sameLength

      boolean sameLength​(Vector b)
      Checks if two vectors have the same length. This method DOES NOT take the two vectors orientations into account.
      Parameters:
      b - Vector to compare to this vector.
      Returns:
      True if this vector and vector b have the same length. Otherwise, returns false.
